name: hydrogen peroxide
sulfuric acid
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (CAS Reg. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid (CAS Reg. 64-19-7), 1-hydroxyethylidene-1,1-diphosphonic acid (CAS Reg. 2809-21-4), and, optionally, sulfuric acid (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9).
